name: Cash on Hand
description: Physical cash in safe or tills. Reconcile with daily cash counts.

name: Bank Deposits
description: Funds in savings/current accounts. Reconcile with monthly bank statements.

name: Bank Suspense Account
description: Temporary holding account for imported bank transactions pending reconciliation.

name: Liquidity Transfer
description: Interim clearing account for internal fund transfers between bank or cash journals.

name: Cash Equivalents
description: Highly liquid short-term investments convertible to known cash amounts.

name: Trade Receivables
description: Amounts owed by customers for goods sold or services rendered on credit.

name: Trade Receivables (POS)
description: Amounts owed by POS customers for goods sold or services rendered on credit.

name: Allowance for Doubtful Accounts
description: Estimated portion of receivables unlikely to be collected (Contra Asset).

name: Other Receivables
description: Non-trade receivables such as loans to employees or insurance claims.

name: Goods for resale
description: Finished goods purchased specifically for resale to customers.

name: Raw materials
description: Basic materials kept on hand for use in the production process.

name: Consumables
description: Supplies used in operations (e.g., packaging) that are not direct product costs.

name: Work in Process
description: Goods currently in production but not yet completed.

name: Allowance for Inventory Decline
description: Provision to reduce inventory value if market price drops below cost.

name: Undue Input VAT
description: Suspense VAT: Input tax from service bills received but not yet paid. Move to 'Input VAT' upon payment.

name: Input VAT
description: Tax paid on purchases. Balance is transferred to VAT Payable/Receivable at month-end.

name: WHT Creditable
description: Prepaid Tax: Income tax deducted by customers when paying you. Claimable against year-end CIT.

name: VAT Receivable
description: Net tax refund due from the Revenue Dept (if Input VAT > Output VAT).

name: WHT Receivable
description: Tax Closing Account: Consolidated WHT tax credits transferred from daily accounts. To be claimed against annual Corporate Income Tax (P.N.D. 50).

name: Prepaid CIT (PND 51)
description: Prepaid Tax: Corporate Income Tax paid mid-year (Form PND 51). Creditable against annual tax.

name: Temporary Investments
description: Investments held for trading or short-term gains (e.g., stocks, bonds).

name: Biological Assets (Current)
description: Living animals or plants held for sale or harvest within one accounting period.

name: Investments in Associates
description: Long-term equity investments where the company has significant influence (20-50%).

name: Investment Property
description: Land or buildings held specifically to earn rentals or for capital appreciation.

name: Land
description: Land owned for operations. Not depreciated.

name: Land Improvements
description: Cost of paving, fencing, or drainage systems.

name: Accum. Depr. - Land Improvements
description: Accumulated depreciation for land improvements.

name: Buildings (Structure)
description: Cost of main building structures owned by the company.

name: Accum. Depr. - Buildings
description: Accumulated depreciation for buildings.

name: Building Installations
description: Integrated systems like HVAC, solar panels, or elevators with shorter lives.

name: Accum. Depr. - Installations
description: Accumulated depreciation for building installations.

name: Construction in Progress
description: Costs accumulated for assets currently being built. Not depreciated until ready for use.

name: Machinery & Tools
description: Machinery and equipment used in production or service delivery.

name: Accum. Depr. - Machinery
description: Accumulated depreciation for machinery.

name: Major Spare Parts (Stand-by)
description: High-value spares expected to be used for >1 year (TFRS NPAEs).

name: Accum. Depr. - Major Spares
description: Accumulated depreciation for major spare parts.

name: Vehicles
description: Cost of company cars, trucks, or motorcycles.

name: Accum. Depr. - Vehicles
description: Accumulated depreciation for vehicles.

name: Vehicle Accessories
description: Modifications or add-ons to vehicles.

name: Accum. Depr. - Vehicle Acc.
description: Accumulated depreciation for vehicle accessories.

name: Furniture & Fixtures
description: Office furniture, desks, chairs, and fixtures.

name: Accum. Depr. - Furniture
description: Accumulated depreciation for furniture.

name: Technology & Computers
description: Laptops, servers, and IT hardware.

name: Accum. Depr. - Technology
description: Accumulated depreciation for technology.

name: Other Fixed Assets
description: Miscellaneous fixed assets not categorized above.

name: Accum. Depr. - Other Assets
description: Accumulated depreciation for other assets.

name: Computer Software
description: Intangible assets for purchased software licenses.

name: Accum. Amortization - Software
description: Accumulated amortization for software.

name: Goodwill
description: Excess payment over net assets acquired in a business combination.

name: Accum. Amortization - Goodwill
description: Accumulated amortization for goodwill.

name: Bank Overdrafts
description: Negative bank balance repayable on demand.

name: Short-term Loans
description: Bank loans or borrowings due within one year.

name: Trade Payables
description: Amounts owed to suppliers for goods or services purchased on credit.

name: Other Payables
description: Non-trade obligations (e.g., payables to directors).

name: Accrued Expenses
description: Estimated liabilities for services received but not yet billed.

name: Advances from Customers
description: Deposit/Downpayment received from customers. Reconcile against the final Customer Invoice.

name: Undue Output VAT
description: Suspense VAT: Output tax on service invoices issued but not yet paid.

name: Output VAT
description: Net VAT liability (Output VAT - Input VAT) to be remitted to Revenue Dept (PP.30).

name: Tax Withheld - PND 1
description: Tax deducted from Employee Salaries. Remit monthly via form PND 1.

name: Tax Withheld - PND 3
description: Tax deducted from Individual Suppliers. Remit monthly via form PND 3.

name: Tax Withheld - PND 53
description: Tax deducted from Juristic (Company) Suppliers. Remit monthly via form PND 53.

name: Tax Withheld - PND 54
description: Tax deducted from payments sent Overseas. Remit via form PND 54.

name: VAT Payable
description: VAT Payable: Tax collected from sales. To be remitted to Revenue Dept (PP.30).

name: WHT Payable
description: Net WHT liability moved here from PND specific accounts at month-end for lump-sum payment to Revenue Dept.

name: Corporate Income Tax Payable
description: Accrued corporate income tax liability for the year.

name: Provisions for Employee Benefits
description: Short-term liabilities for employee benefits like severance.

name: Long-Term Loans
description: Bank loans or borrowings due after more than one year.

name: Employee Benefit Obligations
description: Long-term post-employment benefit obligations.

name: Deferred Income (Gov Grants)
description: Grant income received but not yet recognized as revenue.

name: Share Capital
description: Par value of shares issued and paid-up.

name: Legal Reserve
description: Profits set aside by law (10% of capital), cannot be distributed.

name: Retained Earnings
description: Accumulated profits available for dividend distribution.

name: Sales Revenue
description: Revenue from sale of goods (recognized upon delivery/transfer of risk).

name: Service Revenue
description: Revenue from services (recognized by stage of completion).

name: Sales Returns and Allowances
description: Contra-revenue account for customer refunds or credits.

name: Sales Discounts
description: Contra-revenue account for discounts given.

name: Interest Income
description: Income earned from bank deposits or loans provided.

name: Dividend Income
description: Income received from share investments.

name: Gain on Exchange Rate
description: Profit from currency fluctuations on foreign transactions.

name: Government Grant Income
description: Income recognized from government subsidies/grants.

name: Purchase Discounts
description: Early Pay Gain: Discounts received from suppliers for early payment.

name: Cash Difference Income
description: Cash Diff Income: Cash overages found during reconciliation.

name: Cost of Goods Sold
description: Direct cost of inventory sold during the period.

name: Cost of Services
description: Direct costs incurred to provide services (e.g., labor, materials).

name: Inventory Write-down
description: Loss from reducing inventory value to Net Realizable Value.

name: Import fees
description: Customs duties, freight, and clearance costs for imported goods.

name: Raw materials Used
description: Cost of raw materials consumed in the production process.

name: General subcontracting
description: Fees paid to subcontractors for direct project work.

name: Freight & Transportation
description: Direct cost for transporting raw materials or goods to the warehouse (Freight In).

name: Employees compensation
description: Salaries, wages, overtime, and bonuses for staff.

name: Commissions & Brokerage Fees
description: Fees paid to agents, brokers, or intermediaries for facilitating sales or business deals.

name: Social Security
description: Employer's contribution to the Social Security Fund.

name: Other personnel costs
description: Staff benefits, vouchers, and other non-salary costs.

name: Training and documentation
description: Expenses for staff training courses and educational materials.

name: Royalties & License Fees
description: Payments for the use of intellectual property, copyrights, franchises, patents, or specialized licensing rights.

name: Land Improvements (Depr)
description: Periodic depreciation charge for land improvements.

name: Buildings (Depr)
description: Periodic depreciation charge for building structures.

name: Building Installations (Depr)
description: Periodic depreciation charge for building systems.

name: Machinery & Tools (Depr)
description: Periodic depreciation charge for machinery and tools.

name: Major Spare Parts (Depr)
description: Periodic depreciation charge for capitalized spare parts.

name: Vehicles (Depr)
description: Periodic depreciation charge for vehicles.

name: Vehicle Accessories (Depr)
description: Periodic depreciation charge for vehicle add-ons.

name: Furniture & Fixtures (Depr)
description: Periodic depreciation charge for furniture.

name: Technology & Computers (Depr)
description: Periodic depreciation charge for IT equipment.

name: Other Fixed Assets (Depr)
description: Periodic depreciation charge for miscellaneous assets.

name: Computer Software (Amt)
description: Amortization expense for intangible software assets.

name: Goodwill (Amt)
description: Amortization expense for goodwill.

name: Office Rent
description: Monthly rental fees for office space (Operating Lease).

name: Vehicle rent
description: Rental fees for cars or transport vehicles.

name: Freight & Postage Expenses
description: Administrative expenses for courier services, document delivery, and postage.

name: Office Maintenance services
description: Costs for office cleaning, repairs, and general upkeep.

name: Vehicle maintenance
description: Routine repair and maintenance costs for vehicles.

name: Studies & works
description: Professional fees for research, studies, or external consultations.

name: Accounting Fees
description: Fees paid to external audit or bookkeeping firms.

name: Legal expenses
description: Fees paid to lawyers or legal advisors.

name: Administration fees
description: General administrative service fees.

name: Membership fees
description: Subscriptions to professional clubs or associations.

name: Software Subscription
description: Recurring fees for SaaS/Cloud software (not capitalized).

name: Fire Insurance
description: Insurance premiums for property protection against fire/theft.

name: Professional Insurance
description: Insurance premiums for business liability coverage.

name: Legal protection Insurance
description: Insurance coverage for legal costs.

name: Professional Liability Insurance
description: Insurance for errors and omissions.

name: Advertising
description: Costs for marketing campaigns and advertising.

name: Business gift
description: Gifts for clients or partners (Check tax deductibility limits).

name: Consumables
description: Low-value items used immediately (expensed upon purchase).

name: Office supplies
description: Stationery, paper, ink, and general office supplies.

name: Office services
description: Utilities, internet, and other general office services.

name: Water, electricity, gas
description: Utility bills for business premises.

name: Phone & Internet
description: Communication and internet service costs.

name: Fuel
description: Fuel costs for company vehicles.

name: Property tax
description: Annual taxes paid on land and building ownership.

name: Flights
description: Air travel costs for business purposes.

name: Hotels
description: Accommodation costs during business travel.

name: Public Transportation
description: Taxi, train, or bus fares for business travel.

name: Other travel costs
description: Miscellaneous travel expenses (per diems, etc.).

name: Bar & Restaurant
description: Business meals and entertainment expenses.

name: Food: Reception & delivery
description: Catering costs for office events or receptions.

name: Donations
description: Charitable donation.

name: Interest Expense
description: Cost of borrowing funds (Finance costs).

name: Loss on Exchange Rate
description: Realized/unrealized losses from currency fluctuations.

name: Bank fees
description: Bank charges, transaction fees, and transfer costs.

name: Cash Difference Loss
description: Cash Diff Expense: Cash shortages found during reconciliation or rounding.

name: Corporate Income Tax
description: Annual tax expense on net profit.

name: Current Year Earnings
description: Automated account for current year profit/loss accumulation.
